title: Tata Motors to raise commercial vehicle prices by up to 2% from July 1
description: Tata Motors announced through an exchange filing on Wednesday that it will implement a price hike of up to 2% on its commercial vehicles starting July 1, 2024. This adjustment is a response to rising commodity prices, intended to counter their impact.
